page.title: 05Halesowen Town Centre
page.content: Halesowen is on the edge of the Black Country, about seven miles from Birmingham. The town has a popular and busy traffic free shopping centre, serving a wide area with plenty of free parking. The 155 shops in the town centre provide a variety of goods ranging from food, clothes and household goods to jewellery and cars. There is also a mixture between family businesses such as Dancers, a family store established over a hundred years, to nationwide chain stores such as Burtons, Woolworths, Boots, Sainsbury's and Presto.
